job.title: Manufacturing Test Engineer - Acoustic
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Be part of a revolution! Sonos is redefining the listening experience for music. The Audio Systems Engineering team at Sonos is developing designs that define the sonic performance characteristics of Sonos products. We are seeking individuals that have an eye and an ear for details, are excited about innovative engineering designs, are curious about why things work (or don’t), have an analytic mind coupled with a practical approach, and want to make things sound just right. Have fun every day on this fast paced, creative team and help take Sonos to explore new places in this space. If you love music, solving challenging problems and doing things the right way every time, we’d like to talk to you!
